about_the_game:
Day Trader Tycoon: Make Your Mark in Stocks and Crypto

Day Trader Tycoon is a parody of the stock market where you play as a day trader trying to beat the market. You'll need to quickly react to news and events, leverage insider trading, and participate in several schemes to earn money trading stocks and crypto.

The game is story-based where you interact with a variety of characters and make decisions that impact the outcome, with multiple possible endings.

Gameplay Features


  • Trading Platform: Fast-paced trading where quick thinking in stocks and crypto can make or break you. Markets change in real-time based on news and world events
  • Interactive Storytelling: A story that changes based on what you decide to do, with different endings depending on how you play.

The Story


Fresh out of college with your finance degree, you land a job at Obsidian Capital, a small and shady firm. Your new coworkers are smart and well-connected, but they're not always playing by the rules. It's up to you to figure out how to succeed in this tricky environment, balancing making money with doing what's right in both the stock and crypto markets.



The game will be available for Windows, Linux and Mac.

If you like the game, please consider joining the for more frequent updates & discussions!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550/equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: High-range Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760/equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: Apple Silicon (M1 or later) or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: Apple Silicon (M1 or later) or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Day Trader Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550/equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: High-range Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760/equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Play as a day trader gambling on people's pension money and try to beat the stock market. Engage in a comedic story with multiple endings. Meet different characters and get insider info to use for your own advantage. Gamble on cryptocurrency and quickly react to market events.
